titles.title: A bill to amend the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1985, with respect to interest rates charged to borrowers by the Farmers Home Administration.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1985 to change the effective date from November 12, 1983, to October 1, 1981, for Farmers Home Administration loan rate purposes.
